Review_Text: NEVER EVER BUY FROM FLIPKART.In this day and age, when we have a genuine reason as to why we should return a product, the same is rejected stating it is not in the policy. I have tried 3-4 times and the customer service is pathetic. No matter what happens please buy your mobiles only from AZ or the direct online store.
